name: A Taste of Divinity
rules: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally. If that ally doesn't have fatal damage, put A Taste of Divinity into its owner's hand.

name: Arcane Warding
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally is Untargetable.

name: Backlash
rules: Destruction Hero Required; Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> If an opposing hero or ally dealt damage to your hero this turn, draw a card.

name: Bleed
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, destroy Bleed if attached character is undamaged. Otherwise, your hero deals 2 melee damage to it.

name: Blessed Defense
rules: Target ally is a Protector this turn. Prevent all damage that it would be dealt while defending this turn.

name: Blessing of Kings
rules: Protection Hero Required; Ongoing: Each ally in your party has +X ATK / +X health, where X is its cost.

name: Blind Faith
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may discard your hand. If you do, reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Blood Frenzy
rules: Arms Hero Required; Ongoing: Heroes and allies in your party have +1 ATK while in combat with heroes and allies with an attachment.

name: Brittilize
rules: Ongoing: When Brittilize enters play, you may destroy target armor.;Destroy Brittilize -> Your hero deals 2 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

name: Burgle
rules: Target any number of opposing abilities, allies, and equipment. You control them until the end of your turn.

name: Carnage
rules: Destroy each opposing ally with cost 4 or less.

name: Celerity
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> If your hero is defending against an ally, remove your hero from combat.

name: Celestial Shard
rules: Your hero deals 3 arcane damage to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may put Celestial Shard into its owner's hand.

name: Chain Purge
rules: Target up to three abilities. Destroy the first. Destroy the second if it costs less than the first. Destroy the third if it costs less than the second.

name: Collateral Damage
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 melee damage to each ally in attached hero's party.

name: Concentration Aura
rules: Ongoing: Your ability cards are instant and can't be interrupted.

name: Convert
rules: Destroy target attacking ally. If you do, your hero heals damage from itself equal to that ally's ATK.
flavour: Hunters aren't the only ones who can trap you. - Zophos

name: Convocation
rules: Ongoing: When you play an ally, your hero either deals nature damage to or heals damage from target hero equal to that ally's cost.

name: Cremate
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally. If that character would be destroyed this turn, remove it from the game instead.

name: Curse of the Elements
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: If attached hero would be dealt fire, frost, or nature damage, it's dealt that much +3 instead.

name: Curse of Weakness
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: At the start of attached character's controller's turn, exhaust it unless he pays 4.

name: Dominate
rules: As an additional cost to play, destroy an ally in your party. Your hero deals shadow damage equal to that ally's ATK to each opposing hero and ally.

name: Earthen Flurry
rules: Target a hero or ally, and you may target an additional character for each Totem you control. Your hero deals 4 melee damage to each target.

name: Elemental Weapons
rules: Enhancement Hero Required; Ongoing: Each of your weapons becomes a [Nature] weapon and has +X ATK, where X is its cost.

name: Essence of Mending
rules: Your hero heals 6 damage from each friendly hero and ally.

name: Everlasting Cold
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to attached character, or 2 if that character didn't attack on its controller's last turn.

name: Explosive Trap
rules: Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.) Destroy target attacking ally. If you do, exhaust all other heroes and allies in its party.

name: Fortifying Shout
rules: Ongoing: Heroes and allies in your party have +2 health.

name: Frigid Winds
rules: Target hero or ally can't attack this turn. Draw a card.

name: Grizzly Defender
rules: Ongoing: Ready heroes and allies in your party have +2 ATK. Your hero is in bear form.

name: Hatchet Totem
rules: Ongoing: When Hatchet Totem enters play, put an Axe weapon token into play with 4 [Melee] ATK, 1 strike cost, and Melee (1) if Hatchet Totem is in play. When Hatchet Totem leaves play, remove that Axe from the game.

name: Hidden Weaponry
rules: Ongoing: Destroy Hidden Weaponry -> When target opposing ally is next dealt combat damage this turn, destroy it.

name: Holy Strike
rules: Your hero deals 2 melee damage and 2 unpreventable holy damage to target ally.

name: Ice Barbs
rules: Ongoing: Each opponent can't draw cards unless he pays 1 for each card.

name: Icy Veins
rules: Frost Hero Required;Ongoing: Skip your draw step.;At the start of your turn, target opponent chooses a hero or ally in his party, and your hero deals 5 frost damage to it.

name: Intimidation
rules: Beast Mastery Hero Required; Ongoing: Each opposing hero and ally can't ready during its controller's ready step while you have a Pet.

name: Keys to the Armory
rules: Search your deck for an equipment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

name: Kidney Shot
rules: Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.) Choose X of the following: ability, ally, equipment, hero, and resource. Exhaust all opposing cards of the chosen kinds.

name: Lead Astray
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step. Its controller discards a card.

name: Mist of Corrosion
rules: Choose ability, ally, or equipment. Target opponent destroys a card of that kind he controls unless he discards a card of that kind.

name: Nether Fissure
rules: Nether Fissure can't be interrupted. Interrupt target card.

name: No Man's Land
rules: Attach to target ally in your party.;Ongoing: When attached ally is destroyed, draw two cards.

name: Omen of Clarity
rules: Restoration Hero Required; Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If you do, you pay 2 less the next time you play or complete a card with that name this turn.

name: Overpower
rules: Ongoing: Opposing cards can't be exhausted on your turn.

name: Pack Tactics
rules: Ongoing: Allies in your party have +1 ATK / +1 health. Your hero is in cat form. (+1 ATK while attacking. Destroy this card when you strike with a weapon or play a non-Feral ability.)

name: Path of Cenarius
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has 1, [Exhaust] -> Ready another target ally.
flavour: Those who follow the path of nature will be rewarded with its bounty.

name: Pin
rules: Target player can't play allies this turn.

name: Planned Assault
rules: You can play target ability card from your graveyard this turn if able. If an ability card would enter your graveyard this turn, remove it from the game instead.

name: Reckless Abandon
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> If target friendly ally would be dealt damage this turn, it's dealt to your hero instead.

name: Regrowth
rules: Attach to target hero or ally, and your hero heals 4 damage from it.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero heals 1 damage from attached character.

name: Reload
rules: Ready your hero and one of your Ranged weapons. If you ready a weapon this way, you pay 10 less the next time you strike with it this turn.

name: Resolute Aura
rules: Ongoing: For each armor you control, your weapons have +1 ATK and you pay 1 less to strike with them.

name: Roaring Blaze
rules: Your hero deals 1 fire damage to each opposing ally for each card in your hand.

name: Rupture
rules: Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.) Attach to target hero or ally, and put X bleed counters on Rupture.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 melee damage to attached character for each bleed counter.

name: Ruthlessness
rules: Assassination Hero Required; Put up to five Combo cards from your removed from game zone into hand.

name: Sacrificial Vengeance
rules: Attach to target ally in your party.;Ongoing: When attached ally is destroyed, target opponent destroys an ally in his party.

name: Screeching Shot
rules: Ongoing: Opposing heroes and allies have -1 ATK while attacking.

name: Searing Light
rules: Holy Hero Required;Ongoing: 2, Discard an ability card -> Your hero deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally. Destroy Searing Light -> Your hero deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.

name: Set Ablaze
rules: Ongoing: Set Ablaze enters play with X burn counters. At the start of your turn, destroy each opposing ally and weapon with cost equal to the number of burn counters, then remove a burn counter. If none remain, destroy Set Ablaze.

name: Soulstone
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: When attached ally is destroyed, its owner may put it from his graveyard into play.

name: Spark
rules: This turn, your hero has Exhaust a card in play you control -> This hero deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.

name: Split Open
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: Attached character has -2 health.

name: Tanglevine
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step.

name: Tithe
rules: Ready target opposing ally. This turn, it's a Protector and you control it.

name: Track Hidden
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may have target opponent reveal the top card of his deck. If you do, you may have him put that card on the bottom of his deck.

name: United Front
rules: Target a friendly hero and a friendly ally. The next time each of them would be dealt damage this turn, prevent it.

name: Uplifting Prayer
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you control.

name: Vampiric Dominance
rules: Ongoing: When an opponent plays a card, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to his hero and heals 1 damage from itself.

name: Wavestorm Totem
rules: Ongoing: When an opposing ability, ally, or equipment readies, put it into its owner's hand. (Totems can be attacked or targeted like allies.)

name: Windfury Infusion
rules: Attach to target ally or weapon.;Ongoing: Attached card has +3 ATK. When attached card becomes exhausted for the first time each turn, you may ready it.

name: Adam Eternum
rules: Pay 2 or remove an honor counter from a card you control -> Remove Adam from the game. Put him into play at the start of the next turn.

name: Backstab Bindo Gearbomb
rules: 1, [Exhaust] -> Exhaust target card. If you exhausted an Arena card this way, it can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Baelgond Soulgrace
rules: When Baelgond enters play, reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Bladehands Spigotgulp
rules: Escape Artist (When this ally becomes targeted by an opposing card or effect, you may put it into its owner's hand.);If you would draw a card, you may skip drawing it instead.;When you skip drawing a card this way, turn target resource face down.

name: Blood Knight Haeleth
rules: Protector Once per turn: 2 -->Haeleth heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Bloodwatcher Denissa
rules: When an opposing ally enters play, Denissa deals 1 ranged damage to it.

name: Charkov
rules: Will of the Forsaken (This ally cant leave play unless it has fatal damage or 0 health.) When Charkov enters play, each player puts an ally from his party into its owner's hand.

name: Corvus Promaethon
rules: [Exhaust] -> Remove target ability or equipment from the game.

name: Crusty
rules: Protector;When Crusty deals combat damage to an ally, he may also deal that much melee damage to a second target hero or ally.

name: Dannon Spellsurge
rules: Protector;When you play an ability, Dannon has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Dark Archon Farrum
rules: Will of the Forsaken (This ally can't leave play unless it has fatal damage or 0 health.);Your hero can protect Farrum.

name: Darok Steelstrike
rules: Find Treasure (When this ally enters play, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.)

name: Deathstalker Leanna
rules: Will of the Forsaken (This ally cant leave play unless it has fatal damage or 0 health.) Leanna has +3 ATK while attacking an exhausted hero or ally.

name: Dethvir the Malignant
rules: Undead Hero Required;Will of the Forsaken;If another hero or ally in your party would be dealt damage, you may have it be dealt to Dethvir instead.

name: Dimzer the Prestidigitator
rules: Gnome Hero Required;Escape Artist;When you play Dimzer or another ally, you may put 1 damage on it as it enters play. If you do, draw a card.

name: Drek'Thar
rules: Protector;You pay 1 less to play Drek'Thar for each honor counter on cards you control. 1, Remove an honor counter from a card you control -> Put a Wolf ally token into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and Ferocity.

name: Dundee
rules: As each turn starts, prevent the next damage that Dundee would be dealt this turn.

name: Durgle Wizzledab
rules: Remove an ability card in your graveyard from the game -> Durgle heals 2 damage from himself.

name: El Pollo Grande
rules: When El Pollo Grande deals combat damage, you may put a Chicken ally token into play with 0 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

name: Elder Narando
rules: When Narando readies, he has +2 ATK this turn.

name: Endina the Hunted
rules: Protector While Endina is exhausted, opposing heroes and allies can attack only Endina if able.

name: Gromble the Apt
rules: Find Treasure (When this ally enters play, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.);Your hero can be exhausted to pay costs as though it were a resource.

name: Grudum, Trove Guardian
rules: Protector;Find Treasure (When this ally enters play, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.)

name: Grugthar Sharpblade
rules: At the start of your turn, choose a hero or ally in your party. Other characters can't attack this turn.

name: Hesriana
rules: When Hesriana enters play, you may remove target opposing ally from the game, and Hesriana has that card's printed powers while it remains removed from the game.

name: Iku'tak
rules: Fire Resistance (Prevent all fire or [Fire] damage that this ally would be dealt.);Shadow Resistance (Prevent all shadow or [Shadow] damage that this ally would be dealt.)

name: Illiyana Moonblaze
rules: At the start of your turn, each opponent destroys a [Horde] card he controls.

name: Iravar
rules: Pay 2 or remove an honor counter from a card you control -> Iravar deals 1 holy damage to each opposing ally.

name: Jonas Targan
rules: [Exhaust] -> Jonas deals 1 melee damage to target damaged hero or ally.

name: Keldor the Lost
rules: Pay 2 or remove an honor counter from a card you control -> Interrupt target ally card. If you do, remove it from the game, and its owner puts it into his party at the start of his next turn.

name: Kelm Hargunth
rules: When Kelm attacks, each opponent destroys an [Alliance] card he controls.
flavour: The Warsong Outriders will not back down!

name: Lairin the Grounded
rules: Arcane Resistance (Prevent all arcane or [Arcane] damage that this ally would be dealt.);Nature Resistance (Prevent all nature or [Nature] damage that this ally would be dealt.)

name: Larrington Zarus
rules: When Larrington is destroyed while not an Undead, target opponent puts him into his party, and Larrington is also an Undead.

name: Maeryl Leafstrike
rules: Protector Maeryl has -2 ATK while exhausted.

name: Marundal the Kindred
rules: Each ally has ATK and health equal to its cost, and can't gain or lose ATK or health.

name: Mayla Finksputter
rules: Escape Artist (When this ally becomes targeted by an opposing card or effect, you may put it into its owner's hand.);When Mayla leaves play, you may draw a card.

name: Modric Sternbeard
rules: Protector;Find Treasure (When this ally enters play, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.);When Modric defends, he may heal all damage from target ally.

name: Mojo Masher Shakko
rules: When another ally in your party is destroyed, you may destroy target ability.

name: Mojo Masher Ven'dango
rules: When another ally in your party is destroyed, you may destroy target equipment.

name: Morkad Sharptooth
rules: At the start of your turn, choose a hero or ally in your party. Other characters can't attack this turn.

name: Naan the Selfless
rules: Protector When Naan defends, he deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally and heals 1 damage from a second target hero or ally.

name: Nathaniel Voran
rules: Will of the Forsaken (This ally cant leave play unless it has fatal damage or 0 health.)

name: Nazguk Sharptongue
rules: At the start of your turn, choose a hero or ally in your party. Other characters can't attack this turn. 2, Destroy another ally in your party--> Nazguk has Ferocity this turn.

name: Noxel Shroudhaggle
rules: Escape Artist (When this ally becomes targeted by an opposing card or effect, you may put it into its owner's hand.);Your hero is Untargetable.

name: Orlund
rules: Find Treasure (When this ally enters play, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.);When an opponent discards a card, Orlund deals 3 shadow damage to that opponent's hero.

name: Plainsrunner Marun
rules: Ferocity (Can attack immediately.) When Marun attacks, you pay 1 less to complete your next quest this turn.

name: Plainswatcher Taro
rules: Protector While you control four or more cards in play with the same name, you may play Taro without paying his cost.
flavour: When you need me, my blade is yours.

name: Quenlan Lifeboon
rules: Destroy Quenlan -> Quenlan heals 3 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Rakasa Mournewind
rules: Protector When Rakasa deals damage, target opposing hero or ally can't attack or protect this turn.

name: Royal Guardian Jameson
rules: Protector At the end of your turn, exhaust target ready opposing ally. If you do, you may have it deal melee damage equal to its ATK to a second target ally.
flavour: <font style=BACKGROUND-COLOR: #eff4ff>You dare challenge the throne of Stormwind?</font>

name: Samuel Harrison
rules: Protector Will of the Forsaken (This ally cant leave play unless it has fatal damage or 0 health.)

name: Scout Kurgo
rules: When you play Kurgo, you may search your deck and hand for any number of cards names Scout Kurgo and put them into play.

name: Sergeant Pugg
rules: Other allies have -1 health.

name: Siaranna the Fickle
rules: When a player plays an ability, he gains control of Siaranna.

name: Sivandra Darklust
rules: Will of the Forsaken (This ally cant leave play unless it has fatal damage or 0 health.) When Sivandra enters play, draw a card, then destroy an ally in your party.

name: Skaduzzle
rules: Escape Artist (When this ally becomes targeted by an opposing card or effect, you may put it into its owner's hand.)

name: Spelunker Maddocks
rules: Dwarf Hero Required;Find Treasure Maddocks has +1 ATK / +1 health for each card in your graveyard.

name: Treebole
rules: At the start of your turn, each player chooses an ally in his party. Destroy all other allies.

name: Vanndar Stormpike
rules: Protector You pay 1 less to play Vanndar for each honor counter on cards you control. 1, Remove an honor counter from a card you control -> Each player destroys one of his resources.

name: Vurkeran
rules: Protector;[Exhaust] -> Ready all abilities and equipment you control.

name: Windstriker Larun
rules: Each ally has ATK equal to its printed ATK, has health equal to its printed health, and can't gain or lose ATK or health.

name: Yula the Fair
rules: Pay 2 or remove an honor counter from a card you control -> Prevent the next 1 damage that Yula would be dealt this turn.

name: Zalan Ragewind
rules: Protector When an opponent's hero readies, you may pay 1. If you do, destroy target ability or equipment that opponent controls.

name: Zumbly Fiddlespark
rules: Protector;Escape Artist (When this ally becomes targeted by an opposing card or effect, you may put it into its owner's hand.);When Zumbly leaves play, target ally is a Protector this turn.

name: Apostle of Argus
rules: On your turn: Exhaust your hero -> Your hero heals 1 damage from target hero or ally, or 4 if an opponent when first this game.

name: Arcanite Steam-Pistol
rules: When you strike with Arcanite Steam-Pistol, your hero has Long-Range this combat. When a hero is dealt damage with Arcanite Steam-Pistol, if its controller went first this game, he destroys one of his resources.

name: Bangle of Endless Blessings
rules: When Bangle of Endless Blessings enters play, put each face-down resource into its owner's hand. Players can't place resources face down.

name: Berserker Bracers
rules: When your hero is dealt damage, ready Berserker Bracers.

name: Blackened Spear
rules: Blackened Spear has +1 ATK if an ally with arcane torrent is in your party. This is also true for berserking, Hardiness, war stomp, and will of the forsaken.

name: Blackout Truncheon
rules: When Blackout Truncheon enters play, exhaust target hero or ally. That character can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Bonefist Gauntlets
rules: [Exhaust] -> You pay 2 less the next time you strike with a weapon this turn.

name: Bulwark of the Amani Empire
rules: Bulwark of the Amani Empire can prevent damage that would be dealt to allies in your party.

name: Crackling Staff
rules: When a [Horde] ally is dealt nature or [Nature] damage, destroy it.

name: Don Alejandro's Money Belt
rules: [Exhaust] -> You may reveal an equipment card from your hand. If you do, put it into your resource row face down and exhausted.

name: Dryad's Wrist Bindings
rules: [Exhaust], Destroy one of your resources -> Draw a card.

name: Firemaul of Destruction
rules: You pay 3 less to strike with Firemaul of Destruction if an opposing card was destroyed this turn.

name: Frostwolf Insignia
rules: When you play a card, add an honor counter. If there are six or more on Frostwolf Insignia, destroy it. When Frostwolf Insignia is destroyed this way, your hero heals 10 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Gladiator's Maul
rules: You can place the top card of your deck face down (as your one resource per turn.).

name: Gladiator's Sanctuary
rules: When you place a resource, you may put the top card of your deck into your resource row face down and ready. [Exhaust] -> Attach a Balance ability token with three wind counters to target hero or ally. That ability had Attached character can't attack or protect. At the start of your turn, remove a wind counter. If none remain, destroy this ability.

name: Grips of Damnation
rules: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 melee damage to each hero. 2 -> This turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt this way. Any player can use the power.

name: Heartless
rules: Your hero has dual wield. Put 1 damage on an ally in your party -> You pay 1 less the next time you strike with Heartless this turn.

name: Heartrazor
rules: 1, Destroy Heartrazor -> Target hero can't deal damage this turn.

name: Hellforged Halberd
rules: You pay 1 less to play Hellforged Halberd if an ally with diplomacy is in your party. This is also true for escape artist, inspiring presence, shadowmeld, and find treasure.

name: Hope Ender
rules: At the end of your turn, if Hope Ender is ready, put two +1 ATK counters on it.

name: Jin'rohk, The Great Apocalypse
rules: When a hero is dealt damage with Jin'rohk, destroy up to that many target non-hero cards controlled by that hero's controller.

name: Marksman's Legguards
rules: 1, Destroy Marksman's Legguards -> Target ally has Long-Range this turn.

name: Merciless Gladiator's Gavel
rules: If your hero would deal non-combat damage, it deals double that much instead.

name: Merciless Gladiator's Raiment
rules: Each hero and ally in your party has +X health, where X is its printed health. [Exhaust] -> Target opponent puts three allies from his party into their owners' hands.

name: Pinata
rules: Friendly allies can attack Pinata as though it were an opposing ally. When Pinata defends, destroy it. If you do, draw two cards.
flavour: You hit it for loot, but unlike the Lich King, it doesn't hit back.

name: Steelhawk Crossbow
rules: When you strike with Steelhawk Crossbow, your hero has Long-Range this combat. At the start of your turn, exhaust Steelhawk Crossbow unless you pay 1.

name: Stormpike Insignia
rules: When you play a card, add an honor counter. If there are six or more on Stormpike Insignia, destroy it. When Stormpike Insignia is destroyed this way, your hero deals 5 frost damage to target hero or ally.

name: Vengeful Gladiator's Cleaver
rules: Your hero has dual wield. You can strike with Vengeful Gladiator's Cleaver while an ally in your party is in combat. (If you do, that ally gains this card's ATK and damage type this combat.)

name: Vengeful Gladiator's Earthshaker
rules: When combat damage is dealt with one or more of your weapons, ready all of your weapons.

name: Veteran's Dreadweave Belt
rules: Players pay 2 more to play cards.

name: Wand of Prismatic Focus
rules: When Wand of Prismatic Focus enters play, your hero deals 1 arcane, 1 fire, 1 frost, 1 nature, and 1 shadow damage to target ally.

name: Whiteout Staff
rules: When an [Alliance] ally is dealt frost or [Frost] damage, destroy it.

name: Windtalker's Wristguards
rules: [Exhaust] -> Reveal the top two cards of your deck, then put them on the bottom. If they have different card types, your hero deals 2 nature damage to target hero or ally.

name: Wub's Cursed Hexblade
rules: 2, Destroy Wub's Cursed Hexblade -> Destroy target ally. If an opponent went first this game, put a card with the same name as that ally from a graveyard into your party.

name: Addisyn the Untouchable
rules: 3, Flip Addisyn -> Choose arcane, fire, frost, nature, or shadow. Addisyn has the chosen resistance this turn.

name: Boum the Bloodseeker
rules: 3, Flip Boum -> Target ally has Ferocity this turn.

name: Dorn the Tranquil
rules: 2, Flip Dorn -> Dorn heals 2 damage from each friendly hero and ally.

name: Emek the Equalizer
rules: On your turn: Flip Emek -> You and target opponent each discard a card.

name: Kaniya the Steadfast
rules: 3, Flip Kaniya -> Heroes and allies in your party are Protectors this turn.

name: Katianna the Shrouded
rules: 1, Flip Katianna -> Heroes and allies in your party are Elusive this turn.
flavour: Elune will not see harm come to those who are faithful.

name: Keward the Ravager
rules: 3, Flip Keward -> Opposing allies have -1 health while Keward is defending this turn.

name: Kileana the Inferno
rules: 2, Flip Kileana -> Kileana deals 2 fire damage to each ally in your party and 1 fire damage to each other ally.

name: Kinivus the Focused
rules: 3, Flip Kinivus -> You can't discard cards this turn.

name: Lanthus the Restorer
rules: 2, Flip Lanthus -> Exhaust target ally.

name: Loraala the Frigid
rules: 2, Flip Loraala -> Loraala deals 3 frost damage to target hero. A hero dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.

name: Magnus the Depriver
rules: On your turn: 2, Flip Magnus -> Target player turns one of his face-up resources face down.

name: Meganna the Stalker
rules: 3, Flip Meganna -> This turn, heroes and allies in your party have Stealth, and they can attack Elusive heroes and allies.

name: Ryno the Wicked
rules: On your turn: 2, Flip Ryno -> Put a Felhunter Demon ally token into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and Pet (1).

name: Sepirion the Poised
rules: 3, Flip Sepirion -> Ready Sepirion and one of your weapons.

name: Skumm the Pillager
rules: On your turn: 3, Flip Skumm -> Turn target resource face down.

name: Zi'mo the Empowered
rules: 1, Flip Zi'mo -> Zi'mo has +2 ATK while damaged this turn.
flavour: Before joo know it, joo be dead.

name: Zophos the Vengeful
rules: 3, Flip Zophos -> Zophos deals 3 unpreventable holy damage to target attacker.

name: Alterac Valley
rules: When you play a card, add an honor counter.;On your turn: Exhaust , Remove eight honor counters -> Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you control.

name: Arathi Basin
rules: When you play a card, add an honor counter. [Exhaust], Remove five honor counters -> Draw a card.

name: Eye of the Storm
rules: When you play a card, add an honor counter.;[Exhaust], Remove four honor counters ->Exhaust up to four target heroes and/or allies.

name: Gnomeregan
rules: Gnome Hero Required; Gnomes in your party are irradiated. (When this character deals combat damage to an ally that's not irradiated, it becomes irradiated.);[Exhaust] -> Destroy target irradiated ally.

name: Ironforge
rules: Dwarf Hero Required; [Exhaust] -> Put target armor or weapon card from your graveyard into hand if its cost is less than the number of Dwarves in your party.

name: Undercity
rules: Undead Hero Required; [Exhaust] -> You may remove target ally card in a graveyard from the game. If you do, an Undead in your party heals 2 damage from itself.

name: Warsong Gulch
rules: When you play a card, add an honor counter.;[Exhaust], Remove two honor counters -> Target ally is a Protector this turn.

name: Call to Arms: Alterac Valley
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card. You pay 4 less to complete your next quest this turn. You may add an honor counter to a Battleground card you control.

name: Call to Arms: Arathi Basin
rules: Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put all revealed ability, ally, and equipment cards into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck. You may add an honor counter to a Battleground card you control.

name: Call to Arms: Eye of the Storm
rules: On your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card, and target hero or ally can't ready during its controller's next ready step. You may add an honor counter to a Battleground card you control.

name: Call to Arms: Warsong Gulch
rules: If a Protector is in your party, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card. You may add an honor counter to a Battleground card you control.

name: Capture a Mine
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed location or quest card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Concerted Efforts
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed card with an even cost of 2 or more into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Defusing the Threat
rules: If an opponent completed a quest this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: For Great Honor
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed card with an odd cost of 1 or more into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: In Nightmares
rules: On your turn, pay 8 to complete this quest.;Reward: Target opponent discards three cards.

name: Legendary Heroes
rules: Pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card unless target opponent turns his hero or one of his resources face down.

name: Proving Grounds
rules: On your turn, pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.

name: Rise and Be Recognized
rules: On your turn, pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.

name: Showdown
rules: On your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a unique Mok'Nathal Beastmaster ally token named Rexxar into play with 3 [Ranged] ATK / 4 health and At the start of your turn, destroy target Gronn. Each opponent may put a Gronn ally token into play with 5 [Melee] ATK / 5 health.

name: The Eye of Command
rules: On your turn, pay 7 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw three cards.

name: Towers and Bunkers
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: If you control a location, draw a card. If you control a quest, draw a card.

name: Rise and Be Recognized
rules: On your turn, pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards.

name: Pinata
rules: Friendly allies can attack Pinata as though it were an opposing ally. When Pinata defends, destroy it. If you do, draw two cards.
flavour: You hit it for loot, but unlike the Lich King, it doesn't hit back.

name: Path of Cenarius
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has 1, [Exhaust] -> Ready another target ally.
flavour: Those who follow the path of nature will be rewarded with its bounty.

name: Mist of Corrosion
rules: Choose ability, ally, or equipment. Target opponent destroys a card of that kind he controls unless he discards a card of that kind.

name: Iravar
rules: Pay 2 or remove an honor counter from a card you control -> Iravar deals 1 holy damage to each opposing ally.

name: Hesriana
rules: When Hesriana enters play, you may remove target opposing ally from the game, and Hesriana has that card's printed powers while it remains removed from the game.

name: Hatchet Totem
rules: Ongoing: When Hatchet Totem enters play, put an Axe weapon token into play with 4 [Melee] ATK, 1 strike cost, and Melee (1) if Hatchet Totem is in play. When Hatchet Totem leaves play, remove that Axe from the game.

name: El Pollo Grande
rules: When El Pollo Grande deals combat damage, you may put a Chicken ally token into play with 0 [Melee] ATK / 1 health.

name: Dark Archon Farrum
rules: Will of the Forsaken (This ally can't leave play unless it has fatal damage or 0 health.);Your hero can protect Farrum.

name: Blackout Truncheon
rules: When Blackout Truncheon enters play, exhaust target hero or ally. That character can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Spelunker Maddocks
rules: Dwarf Hero Required;Find Treasure Maddocks has +1 ATK / +1 health for each card in your graveyard.

name: Dimzer the Prestidigitator
rules: Gnome Hero Required;Escape Artist;When you play Dimzer or another ally, you may put 1 damage on it as it enters play. If you do, draw a card.

name: Dethvir the Malignant
rules: Undead Hero Required;Will of the Forsaken;If another hero or ally in your party would be dealt damage, you may have it be dealt to Dethvir instead.

name: Drek'Thar
rules: Protector;You pay 1 less to play Drek'Thar for each honor counter on cards you control. 1, Remove an honor counter from a card you control -> Put a Wolf ally token into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and Ferocity.

name: Dundee
rules: As each turn starts, prevent the next damage that Dundee would be dealt this turn.

name: Jin'rohk, The Great Apocalypse
rules: When a hero is dealt damage with Jin'rohk, destroy up to that many target non-hero cards controlled by that hero's controller.

name: Wub's Cursed Hexblade
rules: 2, Destroy Wub's Cursed Hexblade -> Destroy target ally. If an opponent went first this game, put a card with the same name as that ally from a graveyard into your party.

name: Zalan Ragewind
rules: Protector When an opponent's hero readies, you may pay 1. If you do, destroy target ability or equipment that opponent controls.

name: Uplifting Prayer
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you control.

name: Burgle
rules: Target any number of opposing abilities, allies, and equipment. You control them until the end of your turn.

name: Kidney Shot
rules: Finishing Move (To play, remove X Combo cards in your graveyard from the game, where X is 5 or less.) Choose X of the following: ability, ally, equipment, hero, and resource. Exhaust all opposing cards of the chosen kinds.

name: Keys to the Armory
rules: Search your deck for an equipment card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.

name: Adam Eternum
rules: Pay 2 or remove an honor counter from a card you control -> Remove Adam from the game. Put him into play at the start of the next turn.

name: Illiyana Moonblaze
rules: At the start of your turn, each opponent destroys a [Horde] card he controls.

name: Larrington Zarus
rules: When Larrington is destroyed while not an Undead, target opponent puts him into his party, and Larrington is also an Undead.

name: Vanndar Stormpike
rules: Protector You pay 1 less to play Vanndar for each honor counter on cards you control. 1, Remove an honor counter from a card you control -> Each player destroys one of his resources.

name: Keldor the Lost
rules: Pay 2 or remove an honor counter from a card you control -> Interrupt target ally card. If you do, remove it from the game, and its owner puts it into his party at the start of his next turn.

name: Kelm Hargunth
rules: When Kelm attacks, each opponent destroys an [Alliance] card he controls.
flavour: The Warsong Outriders will not back down!

name: Scout Kurgo
rules: When you play Kurgo, you may search your deck and hand for any number of cards names Scout Kurgo and put them into play.

name: Yula the Fair
rules: Pay 2 or remove an honor counter from a card you control -> Prevent the next 1 damage that Yula would be dealt this turn.

name: Heartless
rules: Your hero has dual wield. Put 1 damage on an ally in your party -> You pay 1 less the next time you strike with Heartless this turn.

name: Reload
rules: Ready your hero and one of your Ranged weapons. If you ready a weapon this way, you pay 10 less the next time you strike with it this turn.

name: Tithe
rules: Ready target opposing ally. This turn, it's a Protector and you control it.

name: Curse of Weakness
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.;Ongoing: At the start of attached character's controller's turn, exhaust it unless he pays 4.

name: Brittilize
rules: Ongoing: When Brittilize enters play, you may destroy target armor.;Destroy Brittilize -> Your hero deals 2 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack this turn.
